trans-unit.source: Allows security policy to be defined by the union of the policy statement of a code group and that of the first child code group that matches.
trans-unit.target: 可讓程式碼群組的原則陳述式和比對的第一個子程式碼群組的聯集所定義的安全性原則。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: Code groups are the building blocks of code access security policy.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼群組是建置組塊的程式碼存取安全性原則。

trans-unit.source: Each policy level consists of a root code group that can have child code groups.
trans-unit.target: 每個原則層級是由根程式碼群組可以有子程式碼群組所組成。

trans-unit.source: Each child code group can have their own child code groups; this behavior extends to any number of levels, forming a tree.
trans-unit.target: 每一個子程式碼群組可以有自己的子程式碼群組。這個行為會延伸到任何數目的層級，進而形成樹狀。

trans-unit.source: Each code group has a membership condition that determines if a given assembly belongs to it based on the evidence for that assembly.
trans-unit.target: 每個程式碼群組有成員資格條件，可判斷指定的組件所屬是否會根據該組件的辨識項。

trans-unit.source: Only code groups whose membership conditions match a given assembly and their child code groups apply policy.
trans-unit.target: 成員資格符合指定的組件的唯一程式碼群組和其子程式碼群組套用原則。

trans-unit.source: Like any code group, FirstMatchCodeGroup only applies when its membership condition matches evidence for an assembly.
trans-unit.target: 任何程式碼群組，例如 FirstMatchCodeGroup 僅適用於其成員資格條件符合的組件的辨識項。

trans-unit.source: If there is a match, it tests the membership condition of each child in order, stopping when the first match occurs.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有相符項目，它會測試每個子系的成員資格條件，順序，第一個相符項目，就會發生時停止。

trans-unit.source: The result of FirstMatchCodeGroup is the union of the policy statement of the root code group and the policy statement of the first child group of that code group that matches.
trans-unit.target: FirstMatchCodeGroup 的結果會是根程式碼群組的原則陳述式和比對該程式碼群組的第一個子群組的原則陳述式的 union。

trans-unit.source: FirstMatchCodeGroup is intended for programmatic use by application domain hosts to set domain policy.
trans-unit.target: FirstMatchCodeGroup 僅供以程式設計方式使用應用程式網域主機若要設定網域原則。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Policy.FirstMatchCodeGroup"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Security.Policy.FirstMatchCodeGroup"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: This constructor creates a basic code group and should be called from the constructors of custom code groups.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式會建立基本的程式碼群組，並應從自訂程式碼群組的建構函式呼叫。

trans-unit.source: Child code groups can be added using the <xref:System.Security.Policy.CodeGroup.AddChild%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用加入子程式碼群組<xref:System.Security.Policy.CodeGroup.AddChild%2A>方法。</xref:System.Security.Policy.CodeGroup.AddChild%2A>

trans-unit.source: A membership condition that tests evidence to determine whether this code group applies policy.
trans-unit.target: 成員資格條件的測試以判斷此程式碼群組是否套用原則的辨識項。

trans-unit.source: The policy statement for the code group in the form of a permission set and attributes to grant code that matches the membership condition.
trans-unit.target: 權限集合和屬性的形式的程式碼群組，授與符合成員資格條件的程式碼原則陳述式。

trans-unit.source: The type of the membershipCondition parameter is not valid.
trans-unit.target: 型別 membershipCondition 參數無效。

trans-unit.source: -or- The type of the policy parameter is not valid.
trans-unit.target: -的型別 policy 參數無效。

trans-unit.source: Makes a deep copy of the code group.
trans-unit.target: 可讓程式碼群組的深層複本。

trans-unit.source: This method makes a deep copy of the code group, meaning that copies of all objects it contains are made, as well.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法也可讓程式碼群組，這表示，它包含的所有物件的複本進行的深層複本。

trans-unit.source: An equivalent copy of the code group, including its membership conditions and child code groups.
trans-unit.target: 對等程式碼群組，包括其成員資格條件和子程式碼群組的複本。

trans-unit.source: Gets the merge logic.
trans-unit.target: 取得合併邏輯。

trans-unit.source: The string "First Match".
trans-unit.target: 字串 「 第一個相符項目 」 中。

trans-unit.source: Resolves policy for the code group and its descendants for a set of evidence.
trans-unit.target: 解析程式碼群組原則和辨識項組及其下的階。

trans-unit.source: Given evidence for an assembly to be loaded, this method evaluates the code group by first checking the membership condition against the specified evidence.
trans-unit.target: 指定要載入的組件的辨識項，這個方法會評估第一個檢查成員資格條件，針對指定的辨識項的程式碼群組。

trans-unit.source: If there is a match, this method returns a policy statement for the code group, including evaluation of child code groups.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有相符項目，這個方法會傳回程式碼群組，包括評估子程式碼群組的原則陳述式。

trans-unit.source: For first-match code groups, each child code group's membership condition is tested against the evidence in the order in which they were added; only the first match is resolved with the evidence set.
trans-unit.target: 第一個相符的程式碼群組，針對其加入順序; 順序的辨識項測試每一個子程式碼群組成員資格條件只有第一個相符項目已解決的辨識項集合。

trans-unit.source: If there are no matches, the policy statement of the parent first-match code group applies.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有相符的項目，適用於父第一個相符的程式碼群組的原則陳述式。

trans-unit.source: The matching child code group type determines how all child groups under it are applied, depending on how the <xref:System.Security.Policy.CodeGroup.Resolve%2A> methods of these child groups work.
trans-unit.target: 比對的子程式碼群組類型則決定如何套用其下的所有子群組，依據<xref:System.Security.Policy.CodeGroup.Resolve%2A>方法，這些子群組的工作。</xref:System.Security.Policy.CodeGroup.Resolve%2A>

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework security system uses <xref:System.Security.Policy.CodeGroup.Resolve%2A> on the policy levels to determine which permissions to grant to loaded code from the resulting policy statements and the code request on the assembly.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 安全性系統會使用<xref:System.Security.Policy.CodeGroup.Resolve%2A>來判斷哪些權限可授與要載入的程式碼，從產生的原則陳述式和程式碼要求組件上的原則層級上。</xref:System.Security.Policy.CodeGroup.Resolve%2A>

trans-unit.source: This operation of this method is as follows: If the membership condition does not match the specified evidence, return `null`; otherwise, set the permission set to be returned (P) equal to the code group's policy statement and continue.
trans-unit.target: 這項作業，這個方法是，如下所示︰ 如果成員資格條件不符合指定的辨識項，傳回`null`; 否則設定權限設定為傳回 (P) 等於程式碼群組的原則陳述式，然後繼續。

trans-unit.source: For each child code group, resolve the code group with the same evidence; if the result is not `null`, return that policy statement.
trans-unit.target: 針對每一個子程式碼群組，解決程式碼群組使用相同的辨識項。如果結果不是`null`，傳回該原則陳述式。

trans-unit.source: If no child code group matched, return P (the parent's policy statement).
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有子程式碼群組符合項目，會傳回 P （父系的原則陳述式）。

trans-unit.source: The evidence for the assembly.
trans-unit.target: 組件的辨識項。

trans-unit.source: A policy statement consisting of the permissions granted by the code group with optional attributes, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the code group does not apply (the membership condition does not match the specified evidence).
trans-unit.target: 原則陳述式，包含選用的屬性，在程式碼群組授與權限或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>如果未套用程式碼群組 （成員資格條件不符合指定的辨識項）。

trans-unit.source: The evidence parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The evidence parameter is .

trans-unit.source: More than one code group (including the parent code group and any child code groups) is marked <xref href="System.Security.Policy.PolicyStatementAttribute"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 一個以上的程式碼群組 （包括父程式碼群組和任何子程式碼群組） 標示為<xref href="System.Security.Policy.PolicyStatementAttribute"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Resolves matching code groups.
trans-unit.target: 解析符合程式碼群組。

trans-unit.source: Given evidence for an assembly to be loaded, this method evaluates the code group by first checking the membership condition against the specified evidence.
trans-unit.target: 指定要載入的組件的辨識項，這個方法會評估第一個檢查成員資格條件，針對指定的辨識項的程式碼群組。

trans-unit.source: If there is a match, this method returns a root code group.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有相符項目，這個方法會傳回根程式碼群組。

trans-unit.source: The code group that is returned contains child code groups, which in turn can have child code groups as necessary to reflect the complete set of code groups that were matched by the evidence provided.
trans-unit.target: 傳回的程式碼群組包含子程式碼群組，也可以有子程式碼群組，以反映一組完整的程式碼群組，以符合所提供的辨識項，視。

trans-unit.source: For first-match code groups, each child code group's membership condition is tested against the evidence in the order in which they were added; only the first match is resolved with the evidence set.
trans-unit.target: 第一個相符的程式碼群組，針對其加入順序; 順序的辨識項測試每一個子程式碼群組成員資格條件只有第一個相符項目已解決的辨識項集合。

trans-unit.source: If there are no matches, the policy statement of the parent first-match code group applies.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有相符的項目，適用於父第一個相符的程式碼群組的原則陳述式。

trans-unit.source: The matching child code group type determines how all child groups under it are applied, depending on how the <xref:System.Security.Policy.CodeGroup.ResolveMatchingCodeGroups%2A> methods of these child groups work.
trans-unit.target: 比對的子程式碼群組類型則決定如何套用其下的所有子群組，依據<xref:System.Security.Policy.CodeGroup.ResolveMatchingCodeGroups%2A>方法，這些子群組的工作。</xref:System.Security.Policy.CodeGroup.ResolveMatchingCodeGroups%2A>

trans-unit.source: The evidence for the assembly.
trans-unit.target: 組件的辨識項。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Security.Policy.CodeGroup"></xref> that is the root of the tree of matching code groups.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Security.Policy.CodeGroup"> </xref>也就是比對程式碼群組樹狀結構的根。

trans-unit.source: The evidence parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The evidence parameter is .
